newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Bekaert lifts stake in TWIL to 100 pct.
newsitem.headline: Bekaert lifts stake in TWIL to 100 pct.

text.p: Belgian Bekaert NV, the world's largest independent maker of steel wire and cord, said on Tuesday it had acquired British Steel's 40 percent stake in TWIL, lifting its stake in the British steel wire maker to 100 percent.
"The acquisition of 100 percent of TWIL Limited will enable Bekaert to unlock the benefits of the integration of TWIL as a full member of the Bekaert Group," the Belgian company said in a statement.
The terms of the deal were not disclosed.
TWIL group is Britain's largest manufacturer of steel wire products. Sales in 1996 amounted to 250 million pounds sterling, representing volume of 360,000 tonnes, Bekaert said.
